::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod arrived at the Cybertronian Fire. He stoped and waited for
Silver Sting to catch up.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit jumped up, soaring over the two Dinobots heads, opening fire
from above. He had enough of getting blown away. He was a little pissed.
(If you dont understand what DrillBit is doing, think of Optimus Prime's
attack at Autobot city, in TF:TM.)
